Galvanize has opened in the Phoenix Warehouse District.Traditionally, industry and education have existed in separate worlds. At Galvanize, we’re bridging this longstanding gap by bringing industry partners, ambitious students, world-class education, and passionate founders under one roof. This is the Galvanize community.Our founders created Galvanize in 2012 with a bold vision: build a community to provide entrepreneurs and learners with life-changing opportunities for growth. Technology has made it possible for anyone with fortitude and resourcefulness to change the world for the better. Galvanize is the fuel to propel anyone to level up.

Boys & Girls Clubs of Metro Phoenix

• Served as Arizona State Youth of the Year chair, responsible for organizing annual statewide youth recognition program in conjunction with the Fiesta Bowl and Tupperware.• Active board member serving on social marketing committee, fundraising and board engagement.

• Led opening of new Groupon office in Scottsdale AZ.• Local site director, direct and indirect responsibility for team of 125+ sales, operations, recruiting, training and facilities.• Fast paced ramp up to full staffing within 9 months.

Deem provides mobile tools to diverse customers, merchants and partners enabling them to lower costs, increase revenue and deepen customer loyalty. • Responsible for sales, sales operations and market development teams for Deem Offers. • Doubled productivity of team in first 6 months, improved performance standards and reduced attrition by 60%.• Developed and executed sales strategies to power products for AAA, Amazon, Microsoft and United Airlines.• Improved sales compensation model, CRM utilization and customer engagement programs.
Hamilton Prosthetics & Orthotics (acquired by Medsource P&O)

Responsible for transformation of medical practice from simple operation to sophisticated multi location practice utilizing business intelligence and performance metrics to improve market share and profitability.  5 Year business plan resulted in successful sale of company to strategic buyer.Responsible for marketing, financial management and human resources.• Brand development, web site traffic growth, social media strategy. • Financial analysis, including business plan & sales strategy development.• Deployed automation, EMR conversion and software customization to manage performance.• Led strategic acquisition plan and due diligence for sale of company.• Responsible for managing growth and improving profitability, resulting in a sale to strategic buyer with capitalization to allow regional expansion.

recommendations: October 13, 2011, Susan reported directly to Diana

Focused, enthusiastic, committed to excellence, driven - and more! I had the pleasure of working with Diana in Real Estate development and sales at azcentral.com. Her feedback was extremely helpful to my development. She has a talent for seeing both the strengths and weaknesses in her staff, with the ability to turn both into successful growth opportunities. Diana is a high energy leader, always available to share ideas, solve problems and motivate the team. I would recommend her for any organization looking for a creative, strategic partner. Her excellent reputation speaks directly to her integrity; both personally and in business.

summary: Strategic Sales & Operations Leader with experience spanning various roles in Tech, Healthcare and Media sectors. Described as "having the rare ability to navigate corporate culture and bridge strategy and execution with a no-nonsense, roll-up-your sleeves approach to get the job done."    •	Proven leader in executive positions at Fortune 500 company: Effectively transformed operations and staffing to create high performing teams, which resulted in increased sales and profit at nine different organizations.  •	Adaptable Leadership: Ability to successfully lead operations in large corporations and small, entrepreneurial start-up firms. Focus on "getting in the trenches when needed and get the job done."•	Industry Transferable Skills:  Applied business leadership skills in advertising, marketing, software, healthcare, apparel, media, non-profit and community/civic organizations.•	Engaged in business, civic and philanthropic organizations in Arizona.
